description.tr: AnizmTV türkçe altyazılı animeyi kaliteli ve güncel izleyebileceğiniz sitedir.
description.en: AnizmTV is a website which enables you to watch subtitled anime with high quality broadcasting and up-to-date episodes.
description.ga_IE: Is suíomh Gréasáin é AnizmTV a chuireann ar do chumas féachaint ar anime le fotheidil le craoladh ar ardchaighdeán agus le heachtraí cothrom le dáta.
description.nl: AnizmTV is een website waarmee u ondertitelde anime kunt bekijken met uitzendingen van hoge kwaliteit en actuele afleveringen.
description.vi_VN: AnizmTV là trang web giúp bạn xem anime phụ đề mới nhất với chất lượng cao.
